name: Make Words or Die
storyline: You play as Chao the janitor, who, along with his sidekick, the Italian cappuccino machine Mr. Ernesto, try to save the world from the terrible Moldies. Stop these dastardly things by guessing passwords to the installation's weapon systems! Bigger words equal bigger weapons that do more damage, or play many smaller words quickly to keep the Moldies from the barrier. Mr. Ernesto is not just a pretty cappuccino machine, so expect upgrades, advice, and of course plenty of good Italian coffee.
summary: Make Words or Die! is a word anagram scramble game with a colorful indie art style. It rewards vocabulary and speed, as every word made helps to keep back the approaching horde of Moldies!
